titleStmt.title: Madam, although my former freedom in writing might rather give me occasion to beg pardon for a fault committed ...
titleStmt.author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Dury by Wing.
Title from opening words of text.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Mr Durys letter to ye Lady Ranalet"; "June 13 1645".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With: Madam, ever since I had a resolution to make a change in my life by marriage ... / [by John Dury. London : s.n., 1645]
